at0000.1.description: Interaction, contact or care event between a subject of care and healthcare provider(s).
at0000.1.comment: Used as part of NWIS pilot.

at0012.1.description: Additional narrative about the calculation, not captured in other fields.

at0000.1.description: Measurement of the body weight of an individual.
Height, or body length, is measured from crown of head to sole of foot.
at0000.1.comment: Height is measured with the individual in a standing position and body length in a recumbent position.
